Articles.Content:
Is there a class to modify/add/subtract achievements (funds, science, reputation)? I googled that topic and found nothing.

EDIT: malkuth responded to my PM and showed me how to do this. THANK YOU.

Funding.Instance.AddFunds(double amount ,TransactionReasons)

ResearchAndDevelopment.Instance.AddScience(float amount,TransactionReasons)

Reputation.Instance.AddReputation(float amount, TransactionReasons)

Edited October 9, 2014 by Apollo13
